tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE market_data (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    open_price FLOAT,
    close_price FLOAT,
    high_price FLOAT,
    low_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    market_date DATE NOT NULL,
    opening_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE risk_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    risk_score DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    risk_classification VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  date DATE,
  opening_price DECIMAL,
  closing_price DECIMAL,
  highest_price DECIMAL,
  lowest_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE risk_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data_id INT,
  risk_score DECIMAL,
  analysis_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_data_id FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES market_data(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_summary (
  summary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(255),
  total_trades INT,
  average_price DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(50),
  trend VARCHAR(50),
  trend_start DATE,
  trend_end DATE
);
